   20: 
   21: -module(register_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: 
   24: %-define(line_trace, 1).
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: 
   28: %-compile(export_all).
   29: -export([all/0, suite/0]).
   30: 
   31: -export([otp_8099/1]).
   32: 
   33: suite() ->
   34:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   35:      {timetrap, {minutes, 2}}].
   36: 
   37: all() -> 
   38:     [otp_8099].
   39: 
   40: %%
   41: %% Test cases
   42: %%
   43: 
   44: -define(OTP_8099_NAME, otp_8099_reg_proc).
   45: 
   46: otp_8099(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   47:     otp_8099_test(1000000).
   48: 
   49: otp_8099_test(0) ->
   50:     ok;
   51: otp_8099_test(N) ->
   52:     P = spawn(fun () -> otp_8099_proc() end),
   53:     case catch register(?OTP_8099_NAME, P) of
   54: 	      true ->
   55: 		  ok;
   56: 	      _ ->
   57: 		  OP = whereis(?OTP_8099_NAME),
   58: 		  (catch unregister(?OTP_8099_NAME)),
   59: 		  (catch exit(OP, kill)),
   60: 		  true = (catch register(?OTP_8099_NAME, P))
   61: 	  end,
   62:     P = whereis(?OTP_8099_NAME),
   63:     exit(P, kill),
   64:     otp_8099_test(N-1).
   65: 
   66: otp_8099_proc() ->
   67:     receive _ -> ok end,
   68:     otp_8099_proc().
